title: Poster, 2010-21-59, 1993
provenance: Acquired new and directly from designers, museums, and cultural institutions by Marc Benda.  Remained with Benda until 2010, when gifted to CHNDM.
creditline: Gift of Sara and Marc Benda
description:
On white background, two jagged, jaw-like black shapes converge at center, forming a triangular shape between them. Directly below the apex of this triangular lacuna is a black circle. 
Inscriptions: at top- "NUSSKNACKER / opernhaus", directly below the black circle- "ab 24. oktober 92 bis marz 93  Peter I. Tschaikowski  Oleg Caetani  Bernd Roger Bienert  Mario Botta  Keso Dekker  Jurg Hammerli  Orchester der Oper Zurich", and at bottom- "ZURCHER BALLETT".
